comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: "Alfred Piccaver (5 February 1884 –23 September 1958) in Vienna, was a British-American operatic tenor. He was particularly noted for his performances as Rodolfo in Giacomo Puccini's La bohème and other popular mainstream operatic roles." This might actually be a better picture than the one that's in the article right now...

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Girl of the Golden West, or La fanciulla del West is an opera by Puccini

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Full-sized versions of LOC photographs of Piccaver now at Wikimedia Commons: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Alfred_Piccaver This picture also confirms the info on the photographer: L. Gutmann, Wien, IX. Bezirk (District), W&aumlhringerstrasse 18.
